price: Samiin isaan (guyyaa sanaan) dhodhootuudha. Baallamni Isaa raawwatamaa ta'e.
arabic: ٱلسَّمَآءُ مُنفَطِرُۢ بِهِۦۚ كَانَ وَعۡدُهُۥ مَفۡعُولًا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: al-samāu munfaṭirun bihi kāna waʿduhu mafʿūlan
